  • Method Details

    • createNewInstance

      public DocumentBuilder createNewInstance(String documentName, boolean hasContent)
      Create a new instance of Document. This method is the entry point of this builder: it must be called before any other method.
      Parameters:
      documentName - document name
      hasContent - defines whether the document has content or not
      Returns:
